src:
Ketimbang ke Italia, Zlatan Ibrahimovic Disarankan Kembali ke Manchester United
01 Nov 2019, 18:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah saran diberikan Paul Ince kepada Zlatan Ibrahimovic. Eks gelandang Manchester United itu ingin melihat sang striker kembali beraksi di Old Trafford.
Dua musim terakhir, Zlatan menjalani karir di LA Galaxy. Bersama raksasa MLS itu, Zlatan berhasil menunjukkan bahwa ia memiliki ketajaman yang mematikan setelah ia mengemas 53 gol dan 15 assist untuk LA Galaxy dalam dua musim terakhir.
Striker berusia 38 tahun itu akan menyelesaikan kontraknya di LA pada bulan Desember nanti. Ia diberitakan banyak mendapatkan tawaran dari klub-klub top Eropa di musim dingin nanti.
Namun Ince menilai Zlatan paling cocok bergabung dengan Manchester United. "Zlatan Ibrahimovic sepertinya tergoda untuk kembali ke Spanyol, lalu ia digosipkan akan bertahan di MLS bahkan ia digosipkan akan pindah ke Perth Glory," beber Ince kepada Paddy Power.

Baca komentar lengkap eks pemain MU itu di bawah ini.
text:
Instead of going to Italy, Zlatan Ibrahimovic is advised to return to Manchester United
Nov 1 2019, 18:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A suggestion was given by Paul Ince to Zlatan Ibrahimovic. The former Manchester United midfielder wants to see the striker return to action at Old Trafford.
The last two seasons, Zlatan underwent a career at LA Galaxy. Together with the MLS giant, Zlatan managed to show that he has a deadly sharpness after he packed 53 goals and 15 assists for LA Galaxy in the last two seasons.
The 38-year-old striker will complete his contract in LA in December. He reportedly received many offers from top European clubs in the winter.
But Ince thinks Zlatan is best suited to join Manchester United. "Zlatan Ibrahimovic seemed tempted to return to Spain, then he was rumored to be staying at MLS even he was rumored to be moving to Perth Glory," Ince told Paddy Power.

Read the full comments of the former MU player below.
